column2: an A.M. Eatery////One of my favorite brunch places in Houston! I love it all. Despite the 1+ hours wait
column3: it is always worth it. When seeing the parking lot
column4: I cannot get zoolander's voice out of my head (what is this
column5: a parking lot for ANTS?) but I'll forgive you Snooze for your tasty food and friendly service. It's not your fault you are so popular
column6: I guess. I always find street parking a couple blocks down so no worries.
